Articles.Content: I haven't had much time to dig into Mission Builder, but a post on another thread about alternate launch sites got me thinking... might it be possible to use Mission Builder to create "starting scenarios" with no particular "plot", "end state," or "scoring"?   Like, say, to establish a KSP starting scenario that includes Baykerbanur as a launch site option, and a trio of comm satellites already in orbit?  Just blue-skying, and it's mostly because I haven't had the time to really dig into MH on anything other than a superficial level yet...

I would think so but I don't know, going to do this later today.

Edited March 16, 2018 by kerbalstar

I think you can do that...

You can:
-open all vab/sph, launchsites, astronaut complex
-set their level
-NOT upgrade them
-enable funding
-set multiple different crafts on different orbits/situations
-hack the save to open the other facilites, but it does not work in the game  

 

so: NO, it is not possible to do, what you want to do with the mission builder...
But If you find a way to put a new launch site up in carrer mode, or lets say, in a "normal" save, you can just set up a ordinary persistent file as you want it \_oo_/

EDIT: I wrote the first line right before I tried it....

Edited March 17, 2018 by stoani96
